title: UK: 3 dead as 'Storm Gerrit' batters Britain - World News
text: videos Gravitas World India SHOWBIZ Lifestyle Sports Science Photos LIVE TV Home videos Gravitas World India SHOWBIZ Lifestyle Sports Science Photos Live Tv UK: 3 dead as 'Storm Gerrit' batters Britain WION Video Team | Updated: Dec 29, 2023, 02:00 PM IST Storm Gerrit wreaks Havoc in United Kingdom. Trains cancelled across Scotland & parts of northern England. Heavy rains are expected across England in coming days.
